informacion_personal.label: Full Stack Developer with multiple years of experience in software development.
informacion_personal.summary: I am a full-stack developer with over 3 years of industry experience. Currently, I work as a Software Developer in the Innovation and Development department at Geh Suites hotel chain, where I lead the innovation area focused on optimizing and improving customer service. My specialization lies in frontend development, creating interfaces, and webpage layout, always striving for optimization and scalability.

work.name: Geh suites
work.summary: I lead the development area focused on guest management and service, developing integrations in multiple environments and creating APIs with node.js for the management and distribution of information. Additionally, I drive the integration of AI to optimize customer and guest service by creating assistants powered by this technology.

work.name: Mr. Rustico
work.summary: I developed a system for the creation, management, and storage of orders for the restaurant Mr. Rustico. I created the interface using Next.js as the base technology for the frontend, focusing on responsive design and efficient data handling. For the backend, I utilized Nest.js and PostgreSQL as the main database.

volunteer.summary: Entrenamiento mediante hecho por la empresa Autonomic mind haciendo tareas de la vida real en la que se evalúa y se retroalimenta y se premia la innovación de las respuestas dadas.

education.area: English as a Foreign Language Program

projects.name: Mr. Rustico
projects.description: Full-stack order management system. Allows generating orders from the customer's table to the kitchen, keeping track of orders and total management of statistics with an administrative dashboard.

projects.name: Plavih
projects.description: Platform for training hotel staff, focused on hotel personnel, which can increase the quality of customer service and interaction by 25% for employees within hotels.

projects.name: Romi call
projects.description: AI-powered reservation telephone assistant, thanks to OpenAI, which reduced the workload in the call center area by 20%, as well as an increase in the number of confirmed reservations by 15% in just 2 months.

projects.name: Blog Institucion Roman de nuñez
projects.description: Research and development blog created for the educational institution Soledad Roman de Nuñez, used to disseminate research at the MILSET Expo-Sciences International 2023 robotics event in which they participated.

projects.name: Freelancer art portfolio
projects.description: Art portfolio enabling exhibition and communication through a form.
